title: Laurie Hernandez, Brian Orser, and more on how to #StayStrong
description:
Athletes and coaches have spoken to us from isolation about their inspiring stories and techniques for staying calm. We speak to runner Derek Redmond, figure skater Mirai Nagasu, gymnast Laurie Hernandez, coaches Brian Orser and Jerzy Gregorek.

For more information and episodes go to olympicchannel.com/podcast
